title: Please help me identify the name of this font
author: YASSA2067

comments.content: The interweb tells us that it was designed by Piero De Macchi for IVECO and his website states that 'Reproduction is forbidden'.... well that's helpful :-/

You have done at least eight posts in the the past three weeks with the same title "Please help me identify the name of this font." This reduces your chance of having someone check your post for something they can identify. At least use some key words such as script, logo, package, serif, sans etc. The more specific you are in your title the more likely a type detective familiar with that category will read your post.  
Also if you know where the the lettering appeared and when, state this information in your post.  
Don
